body:
Comment 4: 
The place to run the chmod is not var/folders/lw/lwqCHwibFFyHAg7uHazH0U+++TI/-Tmp- but 
rather /Users/tof/go.  The assembler is trying to create the output file in the 
directory where the source code lives, not in the temporary directory.

That error message is actually coming from the darwin assembler, not from gcc.
